question_content.description:
### Problem15

The method working directly with the calling code's arguments is called pass by _____(0)\___ (value/reference) approach. The method working with the value of the calling code's arguments instead of the arguments themselves is called pass by _____(1)\___ (value/reference).

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
